title: Introduction of the First Personal Computer
description: The rise of the personal computer, introduced in 1977, revolutionized the way people interacted with technology.

title: Launch of the World Wide Web
description: Tim Berners-Lee introduced the World Wide Web, changing the way people accessed and shared information.

title: Dot-Com Boom
description: The dot-com bubble peaked in 2000 with huge growth in internet-based companies.

title: First iPhone Released
description: Apple launched the first iPhone, marking a new era in mobile technology.

title: Instagram Launched
description: Instagram, the photo-sharing app, was launched and quickly gained popularity.

title: Rise of AI
description: AI technologies like deep learning began transforming industries from healthcare to finance.

title: COVID-19 Pandemic
description: The global pandemic changed how the world worked, traveled, and communicated.

title: Advances in Generative AI
description: Tools like ChatGPT and Midjourney highlighted the mainstream adoption of generative AI.
